question: In an aquarium, we may want to have different fish objects instantiated from each of the `AreaFish`, `Fish2D`, and `Fish` classes. If we wanted to add a new method named `die` to make the fish disappear, to which class or classes should we add this new method?

choices.choice: Any one of these three classes. After defining the die() method in either of them, we will be able to call it from other classes as well.
Only the `Fish` class, as it will be reflected in the other classes.
Only the `AreaFish` class, as this class is like a superset containing all properties and behaviors.
It should be added to all the three classes.
